## ModelFormServiceConfig interface

Represents a configuration object for the model form service.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ModelFormServiceConfig<TState extends {}, TForm extends {}, TFormState extends OptionsFormState<TState>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [customTitle?](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.customtitle.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom title for the form sheet. |
|  [deleteDisabled?](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.deletedisabled.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If set to false, the delete option will not be displayed. |
|  [formConfig](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.formconfig.md) | [ModelFormConfig](./model-form.modelformconfig.md)<!-- -->&lt;TState, TForm, TFormState&gt; | The form config used to configure the form |
|  [formState?](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.formstate.md) | Immutable&lt;TFormState&gt; \| Observable&lt;Immutable&lt;TFormState&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional form state that should be merged with model state |
|  [onDeleteUri?](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.ondeleteuri.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> If set, user will be redirected when deleting the model. |
|  [onSaveUri?](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.onsaveuri.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> If set, user will be redirected when saving the model. |
|  [submitCallback?](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.submitcallback.md) | (val: unknown) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> A callback that gets executed when form is submitted. |
